question:
Consider the following statements about the Vanbandhu Kalyan Yojana (VKY):
  1. Under the scheme, central government provides Rs.10 crore for each block for the development of various facilities for the tribals
  2. The scheme envisages convergence of different schemes launched by Central & State Governments for the tribals
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
It aims at creating enabling environment for need based and outcome oriented holistic development of the tribal people. Under the scheme, centre will provide Rs. 10 crore for each block for the development of various facilities for the Tribals. The scheme also envisages focusing on convergence of different schemes of development of Central & State Governments.
